DOC.brief_title: Investigation 2 Different Oral Formulations Estradiol Norethisterone Healthy Women
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal define least 12 month spontaneous amenorrhoea , serum FSH ( follicle stimulate hormone ) level least 40 IU/L estradiol maximum 25 pg/mL . If date spontaneous amenorrhoea identify previous hormone replacement therapy , serum FSH least 40 IU/L estradiol maximum 25 pg/mL Nonsmoking Body Mass Index ( BMI ) maximum 35.0 kg/m^2 Able understand , read speak German fluently Good state health evidence medical history , physical examination include gynecological examination , result laboratory examination Willing abstain intake caffeine contain food beverage within 48 hour drug administration Known suspect allergy trial product relate product Previous use oral , transdermal , nasal spray , vaginal preparation implant within 8 week prior plan first drug administration Known , suspect history breast cancer Known suspect estrogen dependent neoplasia e.g . endometrial cancer Abnormal genital bleed unknown aetiology Known insulin dependent well noninsulin dependent diabetes mellitus Positive test HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) and/or hepatitis B C Systolic blood pressure ( BP ) equal 160 mm Hg and/or diastolic BP equal 100 mm Hg , currently treat untreated
